ByteEnum.Name: CrawlStatus
ByteEnum.summary: Represents the crawl status of a file.

Field.Name: NotRunning
Field.summary: File system crawl is not running.

Display.Name: Not Running
Display.Description: File system crawl is not running.

Field.Name: InProgress
Field.summary: File system crawl is in progress.

Display.Name: In Progress
Display.Description: File system crawl is in progress.

Field.Name: Completed
Field.summary: File system crawl ran to completion.

Display.Name: Crawl Completed
Display.Description: File system crawl ran to completion.

Field.Name: AllottedTimeElapsed
Field.summary: File system was stopped prior to completion because the alotted execution duration had been reached.

Display.Name: Allotted Time Elapsed
Display.Description: File system was stopped prior to completion because the alotted execution duration had been reached.

Field.Name: MaxItemCountReached
Field.summary: File system was stopped prior to completion because the maximum number of items had been processed.

Display.Name: Max Item Count Reached
Display.Description: File system was stopped prior to completion because the maximum number of items had been processed.

Field.Name: Canceled
Field.summary: File system crawl was manually canceled before completion.

Display.Name: Crawl Canceled
Display.Description: File system crawl was manually canceled before completion.

Field.Name: Failed
Field.summary: File system crawl was aborted due to an unrecoverable failure.

Display.Name: Crawl Failed
Display.Description: File system crawl was aborted due to an unrecoverable failure.

Field.Name: Disabled
Field.summary: File system crawl configuration is disabled.

Display.Name: Crawl Disabled
Display.Description: File system crawl configuration is disabled.

Field.Name: None
Field.summary: No options selected.

Field.Name: SkipSubdirectories
Field.summary: Do not crawl nested sub-directories.

Field.Name: Skip
Field.summary: Do not crawl the current .

Display.Name: Skip Current Folder
Display.Description: Do not crawl the current sub-directory.

Field.Name: DoNotCompareFiles
Field.summary: Do not compare files for redundancies.

Display.Name: Do Not Compare Files
Display.Description: Do not compare files for redundancies.

Field.Name: DoNotShow
Field.summary: Do not show contents of in public result displays.

Display.Name: Do Not Show
Display.Description: Do not show contents of sub-directory in public result displays.

Field.Name: FlaggedForDeletion
Field.summary: Mark for deletion.

Field.Name: FlaggedForRescan
Field.summary: Mark for re-scan.

ByteEnum.Name: DirectoryStatus
ByteEnum.summary: Indicates crawl status for the a .

Field.Name: Incomplete
Field.summary: Not all items in the current have been crawled.

Field.Name: Complete
Field.summary: All items in the current have been crawled.

Field.Name: AccessError
Field.summary: An error occurred while trying to enumerate items in the current .

Field.Name: Deleted
Field.summary: The current has been deleted.

ByteEnum.Name: FileCorrelationStatus
ByteEnum.summary: Represents correlation status of a file.

Field.Name: Dissociated
Field.summary: File has been added to the database or modified and needs to be analyzed.

Field.Name: PendingValidation
Field.summary: Acknowledged; Validation in progress.

Field.Name: Deferred
Field.summary: Final determination deferred.

Field.Name: Analyzing
Field.summary: Correlations to other files are being established.
Field.remarks: This status value is only for new files and those which have changed. Results of comparisons will be stored in the table, where the is the new or changed file, and the is the file that it is being compared to.

Field.Name: Correlated
Field.summary: File has been compared with all other files with the same Hash. Final disposition pending.

Field.Name: Justified
Field.summary: File duplicaton is justified.

Field.Name: Insupportable
Field.summary: Indicates that the files should be deleted.

Field.Name: Violation
Field.summary: Elevated status for unauthorized copies of files that need further attention.

Field.Name: Attrition
Field.summary: Indicates that the file has been scheduled/tasked to be deleted, but not yet confirmed.

Field.Name: Deleted
Field.summary: The file has been deleted.

Field.Name: None
Field.summary: No options selected.

Field.Name: DoNotCompare
Field.summary: Do not compare the current for redundancies.

Field.Name: Ignore
Field.summary: Ignore the current .

Field.Name: FlaggedForDeletion
Field.summary: Mark for deletion.

Field.Name: FlaggedForRescan
Field.summary: Mark for re-scan.

ByteEnum.Name: StatusMessageLevel
ByteEnum.summary: Indicates the severity of a status message.

Field.Name: Information
Field.summary: Indicates that the associated message is informational.

Field.Name: Warning
Field.summary: Indicates that the associated message is a warning.

Field.Name: Error
Field.summary: Indicates that the associated message is an error message.

Field.Name: Unknown
Field.summary: The status of the volume is uknown or unspecified.

Field.Name: Controlled
Field.summary: Volume is under corporate control / ownership.

Field.Name: AccessError
Field.summary: An error occurred while trying to access the volume.

Field.Name: Uncontrolled
Field.summary: Volume is being tracked, but is not under corporate control / ownership.

Field.Name: Offline
Field.summary: Volume is offline or unavailable.

Field.Name: Relinquished
Field.summary: Ownership / control of volume has been relinquished to another entity.

Field.Name: Destroyed
Field.summary: Volume has been destroyed.

Field.Name: Deleted
Field.summary: Volume entity marked as deleted.
